content: tea flower is a soft and airy triangular shawl that drapes very well perfect for the summer the edge of the shawl is made of little flowers that gives it an even more summery feeling if the flower edge is nothing for you this pattern also provides you with a description of an alternative picot border this shawl can be made in any size for more information and pattern visit my blog https //mijocrochet se/2018/06/21/tea-flower/ **join my facebook group ** my facebook group mijo crochet hangout is a social group where you can get support and be inspired by other fellow crocheters welcome https //www facebook com/groups/mijocrochethangout/ --------------------------------------------------------------------------- mijo crochet patterns https //mijocrochet se/alla-monsterall-patterns-pdf/
